column6: Everyone's favorite version of the X-Men from the '90s is back! When Baron Kelly charges the Clear Mountain Project and it's mysterious new director with "mutant rehabilitation," it's up to the X-Men to investigate! PLUS: Free Range Sentiels?!?
column8: | writer:Chad Bowers | writer:Chris Sims | artist:Scott Koblish | penciller (cover):Pepe Larraz
